duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide occupational therapy assistance to students in school-based settings.
Support and collaborate with licensed Occupational Therapists in developing and implementing therapy plans.
Maintain accurate documentation and reporting of therapy sessions and student progress.
Participate in mentorship and growth opportunities to enhance professional development.

education_certification.credential: Graduate from a Certified Occupational Therapist Assistant Program
Current license as a Certified Occupational Therapist Assistant in NJ
